subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The British rider Christopher Froome won the 17th stage of the Vuelta a España, beating the overall leader, Juan José Cobo, in a back-and-forth duel on a grueling final uphill climb in Peña Cabarga in northern Spain.
snippet: The British rider Christopher Froome won the 17th stage of the Vuelta a España, beating the overall leader, Juan José Cobo, in a back-and-forth duel on a grueling final uphill climb in Peña Cabarga in northern Spain.
